prompt: An underwater scene showcasing a coral reef glowing with bioluminescent light surrounded by a swirling tidal wave of magical energy. The wave is intricately detailed with shades of blue and green, and it sparkles with enchantment. In the middle of the wave, a mystical figure, possibly a merfolk sorcerer, is harnessing the power of the ocean with their staff, creating a mesmerizing and dynamic visual. The surrounding reef is vibrant with colorful fish and exotic marine creatures.
